headline: VICI Properties Hits a New 52-Week Low: Is It Time for Income Investors to Place a Bet?
summary: The real estate investment trust owner of casinos and other hospitality real estate hit its 11th new 52-week low of the past 12 months. Here’s why Income investors should consider laying down a bet.

headline: VICI Properties (VICI): Assessing Valuation After Strong Q3, Higher Guidance, Dividend Affirmation and Share Price Pullback
summary: VICI Properties (VICI) just checked three big boxes for income focused investors: it affirmed its quarterly dividend at $0.45 per share, backed that payout with stronger Q3 results, and is now trading at a more appealing valuation. See our latest analysis for VICI Properties. Even after that dividend affirmation and solid Q3 update, VICI’s 1 month share price return of negative 8.8 percent and 3 month share price return of negative 16.3 percent show momentum has cooled. headline: Tenant Concerns Lead Barclays to Lower VICI Target
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On December 3, Barclays lowered its price target on VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) to $33 from $37 and kept an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm adjusted its net lease estimates based on Q3 earnings and recent transactions. The […]
